version_description:
- 64bit support
- minor bug fixes

• 3 new ships: Add three spectacular new vessels to your fleet and set the galaxy ablaze with the powerful Dark Angel, the heavily armored NíTirrk and the shadowy Ghost. All three ships are available in-game and you do not have to unlock them via IAP!

• ATTENTION: OpenFeint features removed due to OpenFeint shutdown. Please transfer your OpenFeint save game before installing the update
• iCloud save issue of Galaxy on Fire 2™ SD resolved: It's again possible to transfer saves between game versions.<
- Minor bug fixes and enhancements

• advanced visual effects (bloom-shader and anti-aliasing!) for an even greater graphical display on iPhone 5S, iPhone 5C and iPhone 5
• bug fixes and overall improvements
Fixed crash in Vossk space lounge

• Get three retro ships from the original Galaxy on Fire in stunning HD graphics for free
• Final Mission-Bug fixed: The game no longer freezes at the end of the final mission
• Wingman-Bug fixed: The current mission is no longer skipped when your w

• OUT NOW - Valkyrie HD: Buy the spectacular first add-on for Galaxy on Fire 2 HD via in-app purchase and get access to tons of new content, features and missions. As a courtesy to our loyal fans you can even unlock Valkyrie HD for free, if you have the s

• Galaxy on Fire 2™ HD now supports the Retina display on the new iPad
• High-resolution textures (four-times higher than before) for an extremely detailed representation
• Refined throttle control: Throttle gesture has been improved
• Crash-Bug
- Optimization for iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone 6 and iOS8
- Bugfixes
- Bugfixes for iOS9
- Bugfixes for iOS9
- Bugfixes for iOS9
Minor bugfixes and enhancements
UI SCALING FIXED: The UI is now being displayed as intended on the iPhone Plus and iPad.

UI SCALE: Adjusted user interface for all supported devices.
SAVE GAME: Fixed iCloud issue. Make sure iCloud Drive is enabled.
STABILITY: Reduced game’s crash rate.

• Fixed the crash during dialogue in the supernova add-on
• Fixed the freeze when using cloaking device
• Fixed the cloak is rendered black effect
• Fixed the crash when saving a screenshot in the action freeze mode

• “GOF Heritage Week” with lots of exclusive special offers: 50% price cut on 10,000,000 credits as well as Valkyrie, Supernova and the Add-on Bundle!
• Additional bloom-shaders and anti-aliasing for even better visuals on iPhone 5S

• Additional bloom-shaders and anti-aliasing for even better visuals on iPhone 5S, iPad Air and new iPad mini with Retina Display
• "Menu overlap bug" fixed: The graphics options menu is now displayed correctly on iPad
